name: aglex
description: API Gateway + Lambda + Express development tool
author: Minoru Nakata <minoru@sprocket.bz>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist; $(npm bin)/babel -d dist src; chmod 755 dist/bin/aglex.js
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test $(npm bin)/babel-node $(npm bin)/babel-istanbul cover --report text --report lcov $(npm bin)/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter spec --check-leaks --recursive test
scripts.test-ci: NODE_ENV=test $(npm bin)/babel-node $(npm bin)/babel-istanbul cover --report lcovonly $(npm bin)/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter dot --check-leaks --recursive test
